main_text.sentence: Blood samples were obtained at the examination centers [14].
The SLN examination was performed as described elsewhere [6].
The examination methods have been reported in detail previously [6,7,16].
In Korea, the MMSE was translated into two versions, the Korean version of the Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE-K) and the Korean Mini-Mental State Examination (K-MMSE) [10,11].
The cohort and examination procedure are described in detail elsewhere [12].
The complete examination programme is described in Andersen, Lolk et al, 1997 [10].
